channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Starboard Value reportedly becomes latest activist investor to take Starbucks stake
item.description: With Starbucks Corp.‚Äôs stock in the midst of a hefty decline this year, activist investors continue to circle the coffee chain. The latest to do so, according to a report on Friday, is hedge fund Starboard Value.

item.title: Stellantis laying off 2,450 plant workers due to discontinuation of Ram 'Classic' pickup truck
item.description: Stellantis will indefinitely lay off up to 2,450 U.S. plant workers later this year as it discontinues production of an older version of its Ram 1500 pickup.

item.title: Harris erases Trump's lead on economy among younger Americans, CNBC/Generation Lab survey finds
item.description: VP Kamala Harris has a 12-point lead over Donald Trump among younger Americans, who also trust her to help the economy, new CNBC Generation Lab survey finds.

item.title: Major players are buying puts. Why?

But that‚Äôs not the real story‚Ä¶ the VIX gradually went back down [‚Ä¶]

item.title: Trump Media narrows quarterly loss to $16.4 million
item.description: Truth Social parent ended June quarter with $344 million in cash, posts revenue of $837,000.

item.title: Tim Walz ‚Äòmisspoke‚Äô when he discussed using weapons ‚Äòin war,‚Äô campaign says
item.description: The statement from the Harris campaign follows criticism of Walz's military record by vice presidential candidate Sen. JD Vance and other Republicans.

item.title: All 61 people aboard plane killed in Brazil crash
item.description: The plane, flight 2283, fell in the city of Vinhedo, Voepass Linhas A√©reas said. The cause of the crash is unknown and under investigation.

item.title: The next big work perk? Getting your Amazon packages at the office. (Thanks, porch pirates.)
item.description: As businesses push for workers to return to their desks, the threat of porch piracy ‚Äî the theft of packages left at people‚Äôs homes ‚Äî looms large. So, a new approach may be merited.

item.title: Trump Media reports $16 million loss for quarter as revenue falls
item.description: Donald Trump, the majority owner of Trump Media, often uses its Truth Social app as he campaigns as the Republican presidential nominee.

item.title: Stocks close higher, clawing back much of the week's losses in major recovery from Monday's sell-off: Live updates
item.description: The S&P 500 managed to erase much of the week's losses.

item.title: Is the economy headed for a hard or soft landing? Music fans think ‚Äòrecession pop‚Äô has the answer.
item.description: Sahm rule, meet Spotify: Pop music is often in sync with economic downturns, economists told MarketWatch.

item.title: Wall Street will get key insight on the consumer, inflation in the week ahead as recession fears swirl
item.description: With growth concerns moving to the fore, how the U.S. consumer is faring could be key to understanding what's next for markets and the economy.

item.title: A key stock underperformed the market comeback this week
item.description: Nvidia lagged behind the broader market this week.

item.title: 10-, 30-year Treasury yields finish lower to close volatile week in bond market
item.description: Yields on U.S. government debt ended mixed on Friday but higher for the week, as investors assessed the fallout from a volatile period in fixed-income markets this week.

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield dips as traders weigh state of U.S. economy after latest data
item.description: U.S. Treasury yields were slightly lower early Friday as investors continue to assess weekly jobless claims data.
